original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Campfire Tales
overview: When their big sister/little sister camping trip is ruined by Fly-ders, Applejack, Rarity, and Rainbow Dash tell Sweetie Belle, Apple Bloom, and Scootaloo the stories of their favourite legends. Inspired by the tales, the girls make the most out of their new situation.
title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Campfire Tales
